resources.string:
About the Authors
 Made by Jonathan and Alex for CMPT 276


Game Information
 Find all the impostors hiding on the skeld! Tap on a cell to check for an impostor.
 If no impostor is found, a scan will be performed, showing the number of impostors on the cell's row/column.
 If an impostor is found, they'll pop up! Once all impostors are found, you win!
 Try to find all the impostors with as few scans as possible.
